Show:

ozpIwc.network.Peer Class

Uses
  • ozpIwc.util.Event
Defined in: src\js\bus\network\peer.js:11
Module: ozpIwc.network
Parent Module: ozpIwc

The peer handles low-level broadcast communications between multiple browser contexts. Links do the actual work of moving the packet to other browser contexts. The links call receive when they need to deliver a packet to this peer and hook the send event in order to send packets.

Constructor

ozpIwc.network.Peer

(
  • [config]
)

Defined in src\js\bus\network\peer.js:11

Parameters:

  • [config] Object optional
    • [metrics] ozpIwc.metric.Registry optional

      The metric registry to put this modules metrics in. If no registry metrics not taken

packetsSeen

Object

Defined in src\js\bus\network\peer.js:46

A history of packets seen from each peer. Each key is a peer name, each value is an array of the last 50 packet ids seen.

Default: {}

#preSend

Defined in src\js\bus\network\peer.js:97

A cancelable event that allows listeners to override the forwarding of a given packet to other peers.

  • packet ozpIwc.packet.Network

#send

Defined in src\js\bus\network\peer.js:106

Notifies that a packet is being sent to other peers. Links should use this event to forward packets to other peers.

Event Payload:

  • packet ozpIwc.packet.Network
